import React from 'react' import "./sidebar.css" import Logo from '../../assets/logo.png' const Sidebar = () => { const toggleStyles = () => { const root = document.documentElement; if (root.style.getPropertyValue('--first-color') === 'hsl(353, 100%, 65%)') { // Change to your new color values root.style.setProperty('--first-color', '/* your new color value */'); root.style.setProperty('--title-color', '/* your new color value */'); } else { // Reset to the default values root.style.setProperty('--first-color', 'hsl(353, 100%, 65%)'); root.style.setProperty('--title-color', 'hsl(244, 24%, 26%)'); } }; return (
© 2023
) } export default Sidebar
